EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM JHipster for Spring Boot.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: JHipster for Spring Boot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar JHipster for Spring Boot with Julien Dubois. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, March 17, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Europe: 2:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e71fdc42953ee0679303859b7c89ff988> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 666 401 963 Thank you,
